title: Replicator

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Create a replica of a player each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- All abilities that would be used on your target are instead used on the replica. If the replica dies, it's destroyed and your target's role is revealed.
- You may only make three replicas.
- Your target can't speak or take game actions and doesn't count for majority until the replica is destroyed.
- Your target can't speak or take game actions and doesn't count for majority after the replica is destroyed.
